header.title: Add Image Watermark to {{FileFormatUp}} in {{EnvName}}
header.description: Adding image watermark to {{FileFormatUp}} files for {{EnvName}} J2SE applications. Add BMP, PNG, GIF, and JPEG images as watermarks to your documents. You can also manage the watermark's size, alignment, rotation angle, and position on the document pages as per your requirements.
header.subtitle: GroupDocs.Watermark for Java API

about.title: {{ProdFullName}} library
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is a comprehensive solution for managing watermarks using {{EnvName}}. With this tool, developers can easily perform operations such as adding, editing, searching, and deleting different types of watermarks from documents in popular file formats. It supports working with both text and image watermarks in a variety of documents, including PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, email, and image formats. {{ProdShortName}} supports all major operating systems and {{EnvName}} versions including J2SE 7.0 (1.7), J2SE 8.0 (1.8) or above.
